articles.title: Solar storm confirms Vikings settled in North America exactly 1000 years ago - The Guardian
articles.description: Analysis of wood from timber-framed buildings in Newfoundland shows Norse-built settlement 471 years before Columbus
articles.content: Long before Columbus crossed the Atlantic, eight timber-framed buildings covered in sod stood on a terrace above a peat bog and stream at the northern tip of Canadas island of Newfoundland, evidence … [+3411 chars]

articles.title: Parkland school shooter Nikolas Cruz pleads guilty to 17 counts of murder - ABC News
articles.description: Nikolas Cruz committed one of America's deadliest school shootings. In pleading guilty to 17 counts of murder he now faces a penalty trial that will decide whether he is executed or spends life in prison without the possibility of parole.
